Life

Posted a paper regarding the quantum algorithm to solve the differential equation.

Posted a paper regarding the quantum measurement optimization.

Posted a paper regarding the expressive quantum machine learning with KPO.

Gave a seminar at Center for Quantum Technologies in National University of Singapore

Talked at the QRST seminar

Posted a paper proposing a higher-order randomized algorithm for the Hamiltonian simulation

Moved to Toronto and joined the Matter Lab (Prof. Alan Aspuru-Guzik group)

Posted a paper regarding random features for the quantum kernel method

Posted a paper regarding the measurement optimization in the variational time evolution.

Posted a paper regarding the solution to the over-fitting problem in quantum machine learning.

Received my Ph.D.
